dict.string: Kai needs access to your calendar to display your events and help you manage your schedule.
Kai needs access to your calendar to display your events and help you manage your schedule.
Kai uses your location to provide accurate weather forecasts and location-based assistance.
Kai needs microphone access to record meetings for transcription.
Kai needs access to your reminders to include them in briefings and help manage your tasks.
